[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: calculate_cetus_position_value()] [Oracle Price Reuse] Can the same oracle prices be reused across multiple position valuations without freshness checks, enabling manipulation during volatile periods? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: calculate_cetus_position_value()] [Slippage Logic Inversion] Does the slippage check in line 63-66 correctly handle both pool_price > oracle_price and pool_price < oracle_price scenarios symmetrically? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: calculate_cetus_position_value()] [Zero Position Value] Can a position with zero liquidity (amount_a=0, amount_b=0) cause issues in subsequent vault calculations expecting non-zero values? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Integer Overflow] In line 79, can '(sqrt_price_x64 as u256) * DECIMAL' overflow u256 when sqrt_price_x64 is at u128::MAX? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Division by Zero] In line 79, pow(2, 64) is constant, but can any edge case cause this division to fail or return unexpected values? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Squaring Overflow] In line 80-81, can 'sqrt_price_u256_with_decimals * sqrt_price_u256_with_decimals' overflow u256 before division by DECIMAL? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Precision Loss] In line 81, does dividing by DECIMAL after squaring cause significant precision loss affecting slippage checks? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Decimal Adjustment] In line 84, can 'price_u256_with_decimals * pow(10, decimals_a - decimals_b)' overflow u256 when decimal differences are large? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Decimal Adjustment] In line 86, can 'price_u256_with_decimals / pow(10, decimals_b - decimals_a)' lose critical precision when decimal differences are large? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Equal Decimals] When decimals_a == decimals_b, does the function correctly return price_u256_with_decimals without adjustment? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Invalid Decimals] Can decimals_a or decimals_b be > 38 (u256 max ~1e77), causing pow(10, diff) to overflow or become unrepresentable? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Zero sqrt_price] When sqrt_price_x64 is zero, does this correctly return zero price or cause division by zero in subsequent calculations? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Precision Constant] Is DECIMAL = 1e18 appropriate for all token decimal combinations, or can mismatches cause incorrect price conversions? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Integration] Can an attacker create a Cetus position with extreme tick ranges that cause amount calculations to overflow in calculate_cetus_position_value? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Integration] Can position NFT ownership be transferred mid-calculation, causing get_position_amounts to return different values than expected? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Integration] If vault.get_defi_asset() returns a stale position reference, can outdated liquidity values be used for valuation? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Integration] Can the OracleConfig be updated between oracle price fetches in calculate_cetus_position_value, causing inconsistent price data? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Integration] Can vault.finish_update_asset_value() be called with an incorrect usd_value if calculate_cetus_position_value reverts silently in some edge case? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Integration] Is there protection against calling update_cetus_position_value for the same asset_type multiple times in quick succession to manipulate vault state? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Constant] Can DECIMAL = 1e18 cause overflow when multiplied with large prices or amounts in any calculation path? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Constant] Can SLIPPAGE_BASE = 10000 be insufficient precision for very tight slippage tolerances required by the protocol? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Error Code] Does ERR_INVALID_POOL_PRICE = 6001 conflict with other error codes in the vault system, potentially masking the real error source? (Low)
